meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the Board President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Assistant General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of the October 22, 2024 DPFC Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Disclosure of any relationships by DPFC Board members with projects on the agenda.

agenda_items.title: Executive Session Agenda
agenda_items.description: Closed meeting to discuss legal matters.

agenda_items.title: Demolition Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the demolition of the facility at 9999 Technology Blvd., Dallas, TX.

agenda_items.title: Resolution Approval for Oakhouse Phase 2
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution for the transaction for Oakhouse Phase 2.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Articles of Incorporation
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the DPFC Articles of Incorporation and bylaws.

agenda_items.title: Board Officer Elections
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of DPFC Board officer elections.

agenda_items.title: Hiring Committee Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion by the Hiring Committee Chair.

agenda_items.title: Housing and Homeless Solution Committee Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the special called meeting.

agenda_items.title: Property Monitoring Procedures
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on DPFC-owned property monitoring procedures.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Annual Report Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the DPFC 2024 annual report.

agenda_items.title: Website Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC website.

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report Discussion
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC pipeline report.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the Board President.
